entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 30
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S

HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

LOWS IN THE MID 30S
